Group.title: List of installed software services
Group.description: The following sections contain information on security-relevant choices about software services that may be installed on the operating system.

Group.title: Risky software services
Group.description: Some software services impact the overall system security due to their behavior (leak of confidentiality in network exchange, usage as uncontrolled communication channel, risk associated with the service due to its old age, etc.

Rule.title: Uninstall the telnet server
Rule.description: The telnet daemon should be uninstalled.
Rule.rationale: telnet allows clear text communications, and does not protect any data transmission between client and server. Any confidential data can be listened and no integrity checking is made.
